Tip of the Day
The base chance to find most Chests is 1/250, which you can increase with better gear and tools.

Steel bar
Type: Material
Value: 4
Fine Value: 24
Keyword: Bar
Properties:
Bankable:     Droppable:
Sellable:     Tradable:

Forged in the fires of determination, the steel bar glimmers with ethereal luster.

The Steel bar item is a material.

Uses

Recipe Ingredient

Steel bar is an ingredient in the following recipes:

Job Boards

Steel bar can be requested from the following job:

Job Board Name Location Quantity Item Type Reward
Azurazera job board Azurazera 43 +2  Jarvonia Faction Reputation
